label: Behavior 08806454
summary: Vessel behavior pattern: following a curved maritime route (the vessel is navigating along a geographically constrained path, likely a designated shipping lane or coastal route with a gentle curvature; the simultaneous southward and eastward progression with gradual COG shift suggests movement along a known arc-shaped trajectory approximated by a second-order polynomial in latitude-longitude space: Δlat ≈ a·Δlon² + b·Δlon + c)
